articles.description: Sony surprises with an early announcement of its new TVs ahead of CES 2021 and we're excited by what we see.
articles.content: CES 2021 is underway, though not quite yet officially. The hot new TVs weve been looking forward to hearing about are already getting official announcements and you might be surprised to learn that S… [+4766 chars]
